title: Evelynn/Swain
body:
Is anyone else hyped for Evelynn's and Swain's rework too? Or am i the only one?
{{champion:28}} {{champion:50}}

replies.body: Ayyyyyy I'm ready to see this reworked master tactician in action that's for sure!
The Swain VGU is the most exciting upcoming event in my whole three years since I started League.

> [{quoted}](name=Brutusness,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=dxNOOJ0n,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-08-13T22:04:08.996+0000)
>
> The Swain VGU is the most exciting upcoming event in my whole three years since I started League.

That's been Eve for me. Ever since I heard that they were considering reworking Eve I was looking forward to it and it's been three years more or less.
